DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study evaluate efficacy safety accessory laser tattoo removal allow multiple pass within single treatment session .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study evaluate efficacy safety accessory laser tattoo removal allow multiple pass within single treatment session . One half tattoo randomly assign laser treatment utilizing Device ( `` Device half '' ) ; half receive laser treatment without Device serve control ( `` Control half '' ) . Based statistical analysis sample size calculation , 30 subject enrol . The tattoo must large approximately 2 ½ '' x 6 '' 3 '' x 5 '' size , ½ tattoo cover single patch . Each subject receive single Treatment Session consist 5 minute . Investigators administer standard laser treatment Device Control sit use well-established tattoo-removal treatment parameter laser use . Subjects return follow approximately one month post-treatment . The presence side effect adverse event assess recorded Device Control sit immediately treatment 1-month follow-up visit .
DOC.criteria: Subjects present tattoo approximately 2 ½ '' x 6 '' 3 '' x 5 '' small size . Fitzpatrick skin type I III Women childbearing potential use accepted form contraception least 3 month prior enrollment study period ( i.e. , oral contraceptive , IUD , contraceptive implant , barrier method spermicide , abstinence ) Subjects provide write informed consent Subjects agree treatment guideline followup visit Subjects young 18 year age Subjects traumatic tattoo As per investigator 's discretion , physical mental condition might make unsafe subject participate study Subjects pregnant breastfeeding Subjects tan As per investigator 's discretion , subject history keloid scar abnormal wound heal Subjects use oral retinoids ( isotretinoin acitretin ) within 12 month study entry Subjects currently participate plan participate clinical trial specifically design treat tattoo course study duration participation study Subjects refuse sign inform consent form and/or refuse comply study requirement .
